item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Why T.I.n.Y? T.I.n.Y is the short form of Talent In You. We wish to explore the talent of all TINYers. Does TINY only need actors? No. Drama production process actually needs people have various capabilities. You would definitely find your place in TINY if you have any of the talents or want to train your abilities below. Scriptwriting, directing, movie-editing, marketing, networking, event-organizing, music, web-management and design, photography and photoshop.
